name.japanese: スリラーバーク海賊団

flagDescription: A skull with bat wings and crossbones

keyMoments.title: Creation of Ultimate Zombie Warrior
keyMoments.description: Gecko Moria completes his plan to create the ultimate zombie by implanting Luffy's shadow into Oars, adding the most powerful zombie to the Thriller Bark Pirates' forces.
keyMoments.significance: Represents the peak of the Thriller Bark Pirates' zombie army strength.

keyMoments.title: Thriller Bark Pirates Discover Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Members of the Thriller Bark Pirates including Absalom, Perona, and zombie soldiers discover and attack the infiltrating Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of direct confrontation between the two crews.

statusHistory.description: Thriller Bark Pirates operate throughout the arc

goals: Create an army of zombies to control the seas
Collect powerful shadows to make stronger zombies
Use zombie army to become Pirate King

flagDescription: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossbones

keyMoments.title: Straw Hats Discovered by Thriller Bark Pirates
keyMoments.description: Usopp, Nami, and Chopper are discovered while infiltrating the mansion, forcing them into direct confrontation.
keyMoments.significance: Ends their stealth mission and begins active combat.

keyMoments.title: Crew Members Reunite with Salt Knowledge
keyMoments.description: Franky and Robin rescue Usopp and Chopper using salt to defeat zombies, showing the crew's growing knowledge of enemy weaknesses.
